name: Games and poems
description:
A game(Kinda) where you can read poems written by various videogame characters. Only has 5 characters for now.      

Warning! 

 May contain spoilers.

Games featured:

Yandere simulator: Yandere dev

Fran Bow: Killmonday games

FnaF: Scott Cawthon

Mr Hopp's playhouse: Moonbit Studios

Doki Doki Literature Club: Team Salvoto

Note!

I am 14 and this is my first game so please give me tips on how to be better.

BYE!
